dict.acceptation: 东，东方；东方国家；〈诗〉东风；
东方的，向东方的；从东方来的；

sent.orig: Implement of the data acquisition supply essential technical diagnosis data for EAST experimental device.
sent.trans: 它的建立为EAST装置实验提供了必要的技术诊断数据。

sent.orig: EAST Lower Hybrid Current Drive(LHCD) network system is based on Industrial Ethernet of the multi-ring network.
sent.trans: EAST低杂波网络系统建立在工以太网基础之上的环状多网络。

sent.orig: This has successfully been applied to EAST assemble simulation.
sent.trans: 同时提高了检测的精度，并在EAST三环吊装仿真中得到成功应用。

sent.orig: The thermal shield (TS) is a main part of EAST superconducting Tokamak.
sent.trans: 冷屏是EAST超导托卡马克核聚变实验装置的重要部件之一。

sent.orig: The measuring method of poloidal field coil position on EAST is studied.
sent.trans: 文中对EAST（全超导托卡马克装置）上极向场线圈位置测量方法进行了研究与设计。
